mapper.select: select * from (select rownum rnum, DEP_ID, BOARD_ID, EMP_ID, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_DETAIL, CREATE_DATE, MODIFY_DATE, DELETE_DATE, VIEWS_NUM from (select * from board order by BOARD_ID desc)) left join department using(DEP_ID) left join employee using(EMP_ID) where rnum >= #{ startRow } and rnum <= #{ endRow } order by BOARD_ID desc

select * from (select rownum rnum, DEP_ID, BOARD_ID, EMP_ID, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_DETAIL, CREATE_DATE, MODIFY_DATE, DELETE_DATE, VIEWS_NUM from (select * from board order by BOARD_ID desc)) left join department using(DEP_ID) left join employee using(EMP_ID) where EMP_ID = #{ empId } and (rnum >= #{ startRow } and rnum <= #{ endRow }) order by BOARD_ID desc

select * from (select rownum rnum, DEP_ID, BOARD_ID, EMP_ID, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_DETAIL, CREATE_DATE, MODIFY_DATE, DELETE_DATE, VIEWS_NUM from (select * from board where create_date between #{ begin } and (to_date(#{ end }) + 1 - 1/86400) order by BOARD_ID desc)) left join department using(DEP_ID) left join employee using(EMP_ID) where rnum >= #{ startRow } and rnum <= #{ endRow } order by BOARD_ID desc

SELECT count(*) from board join employee using (EMP_ID) where emp_name like '%' || #{ keyword } || '%'
